title: (x) Square slab serif in Wired - custom face by H&FJ {Chris Keegan}
author: miles

comments.content: looks like a modified version of emigre's cholla

There is a discussion about this [HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230440/http:/www.beadesigngroup.com/blog/archives/2007/01/wired_redesign.shtml) and [HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230440/http:/www.wired.com/news/wiredmag/0,72530-0.html?tw=rss.index). It's custom by Hoefler & Frere-Jones.
pretty horrible - faddish - i think, expect better from H&FJ

One's heart has to be in it.

hhp
Hrant, that kind of post is extremely hurtful. Tobias and Andy and I worked very hard on those faces.

Well I like it Jonathan. I think it's well done.

Speaking of pretty horrible and faddish; you wouldn't have had anything to do with the 2112 Olympic typeface that accompanies that lovely logo would you Miles?

Nick Cooke
